name: Lost Volcano
description:
Lava Coat Girl: Has Evasion

Up, Down, Left, Right : Movement

Lava Coat Boy: More Speed

Space to play and restart the game, V to Mute, Score = Timer by Seconds

A scratch game in where you have to survive 1 minute. Also, if you are far from each other, Lava Coat Boy will be alerted. If you are too far, it's a game over. It fits with the theme joined together because they had to fight off something... They had to to tell everyone where the lost volcano was. Pog.

Credits:

Programmer: Takago/Catago101

Artist: Miyaki

Composer: MNDV.ecb
